text: John Willie Drummond (September 29, 1919 â€“ September 3, 2016) was an American politician. He was a Democrat. He served as a member of the South Carolina Senate from 1966 to 2008. He represented the state 10th district during his time in office. He was also a member of the South Carolina House of Representatives from 1965 to 1966. He was born in Greenwood, South Carolina. Drummond died in Ninety Six, South Carolina, on September 3, 2016. He was 96. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1919 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Politicians from South Carolina Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:State legislators of the United States Category:20th-century American politicians Category:21st-century American politicians
title: John W. Drummond
